Name: team_size_limit
Description: Team size must not exceed 9 members

Name: project_budget_limit
Description: Project budget must not be exceeded

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: Sprint duration must be exactly 2 weeks

Name: skill_requirement
Description: Each team must have at least one member with a certified skill

Name: blocker_resolution_time
Description: Blockers must be resolved within 2 days

Name: velocity_trend_positive
Description: Velocity trend must be positive over the last 3 sprints

Name: release_plan_feasibility
Description: Release plan must only include features that are completed

Name: scrum_master_experience
Description: Scrum Master must have at least 2 years of experience

Name: product_backlog_priority
Description: Product Backlog items must be ordered by priority

Name: daily_scrum_attendance
Description: All team members must attend the daily scrum

Name: sprint_goal_achievable
Description: Sprint goal must be achievable within the sprint duration
